entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
